title: Travel Fanatix
description: A daily travel planner that can get details about a city, has a planner and also gives nearby activity recommendations.

title: Poster Fusion 9
description: A web app that lets you choose nine of your favourite movies and creates the ultimate movie poster out of the nine film posters
skills: HTML - CSS - JavaScript - JSON - Web Apis - JQuery

title: Weather Dashboard
description: A weather dashboard that lets you type in a city and it will give you the current and also the 5 day forecast for that City

title: Timed Coding Quiz
description: A timed coding quiz with multiple questions that saves your scores and keeps them in a leader board table

title: Etch-A-Sketch
description: An Etch-A-Sketch app where you can choose the amount of pixels on the screen and randomise the pixel colour

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: A calendar application that allows users to save events for each hour of the day and is dynamically updated
